text: Float Like a Butterfly is an Irish drama film, directed by Carmel Winters and released in 2018."TIFF review: Float Like A Butterfly". Now, August 31, 2018. The film stars Hazel Doupe as Frances, a young Irish Traveller girl who idolizes Muhammad Ali and aspires to become a boxer."‘Float Like A Butterfly’: First Footage Of Toronto-Bound Irish Boxing Drama". Deadline Hollywood, August 22, 2018. The film premiered at the 2018 Toronto International Film Festival, where it won the FIPRESCI Discovery Prize."TIFF 2018 Awards: ‘Green Book’ Wins the People’s Choice Award, Upsetting ‘A Star Is Born’". IndieWire, September 16, 2018. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2018 films Category:Irish films Category:Irish drama films Category:Works about Irish Travellers
title: Float Like a Butterfly
